Class Container<C extends Container<?,?>,BRS extends BorderableRectangleStructure<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.element.Element
      • ch.nolix.element.util.OptionalNamableElement<CE>

            • ch.nolix.element.dialog.BorderableRectangle<C,BRS>
              • ch.nolix.element.dialog.Container<C,BRS>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILevel1Controller, ILevel2Controller, OptionalNamable<C>, OptionalTokenable<C>, Resettable, Typed, Configurable, Specifiable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SingleContainer, Stack, TabContainer

    public abstract class Container<C extends Container<?,?>,BRS extends BorderableRectangleStructure<?>>
extends BorderableRectangle<C,BRS>
    A container is a rectangle that contains other rectangles.
